q1.question: Is it free?
q1.answer: Yes! Circle Picks is completely free to use. We believe everyone should have access to great recommendations from people they trust.

q2.question: Do my friends need to be on Circle Picks?
q2.answer: Not necessarily! You can explore public recommendations from the community. But the experience gets even better when your friends join and share their favorite spots.

q3.question: How is this different from Yelp or Google Reviews?
q3.answer: Instead of anonymous reviews from strangers, Circle Picks shows you recommendations from people you actually know and trust. No fake reviews, no sponsored content - just real picks from real friends.

q4.question: Can I keep my recommendations private?
q4.answer: Absolutely! You control who sees your recommendations. You can share publicly, only with followers, or keep spots private for yourself.

q5.question: What if I don't have many friends on the app yet?
q5.answer: Start by exploring public recommendations from the community. You can also invite friends directly from the app. The more friends you connect with, the more personalized your experience becomes!
